net.newbiehacker.commodorej
Class IRCConnection

java.lang.Object
  net.newbiehacker.commodorej.Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class IRCConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class represents a connection to an IRC server with methods for obtaining information on the channels we're currently on and the users we've seen, etc.

containsUser

public boolean containsUser(java.lang.String nick)
Returns whether we have user data cache'd for the specified nick
If this method returns true, it does not necessarily mean that the specified user is currently online, just that they have been during the runtime of the bot

Parameters:
nick - the nick we're checking for
Returns:
whether we have uder data cache'd for the specified nick

Parameters:

Returns:
the user with the specified nick or null if we do not have their information
